description: LOWELL -- The UMass Lowell women's basketball fell in the battle of Bay State schools, as the Massachusetts Minutewomen outlasted the hosts, 73-63, at the Costello Athletic Center on Wednesday...
title: UML Women Downed at Home
maintext:
LOWELL -- The UMass Lowell women’s basketball fell in the battle of Bay State schools, as the Massachusetts Minutewomen outlasted the hosts, 73-63, at the Costello Athletic Center on Wednesday night.
College basketball
Paula Lopez (Leon, Spain) led the River Hawks (3-8) with 17 points and three assists, as she connected on three three-pointers. Linda Svenne (Riga, Latvia) added 11 and Megan Hendrick (Alexandria, Va.) chipped in 10 to round out the leading scorers for UMass Lowell.
The Minutewomen (8-4) had four players reach double figures, paced by Hailey Leidel’s 21 points and Maggie Mulligan’s double-double by way of 13 points and 13 rebounds.
Bre Hampton-Bey and Genesis Rivera contributed 11 and 10 points, respectively.
Trailing 7-2 in the early minutes, Svenne and Lopez brought the River Hawks even, and Lopez put the hosts on top, 11-9, for the first time just over four minutes in. The duo also connected on back-to-back threes to pull the River Hawks within 23-22 after the visitors led 21-16 at the start of the second.
